DESCRIPTION: When a creature's Doom meets or exceeds its current HP, it dies at the end of its turn.
At the end of your turn, gain #yBlock. #yPlating is reduced by #b1 at the start of your turn.
If this card is in your hand at the end of turn, it is shuffled into your draw pile.
If this card is discarded from your hand during your turn, play it for free.
